entry.description: The flexbox is single-line. The cross-start direction is equivalent to either the 'start' or 'before' direction of the current writing mode, whichever is in the cross-axis, and the cross-end direction is the opposite direction of cross-start.

The flexbox is multi-line. The cross-start direction is equivalent to either the 'start' or 'before' direction of the current writing mode, whichever is in the cross-axis, and the cross-end direction is the opposite direction of cross-start.
Same as 'wrap', except the cross-start and cross-end directions are swapped.

CssProperty.name: align-content
CssProperty.description: Aligns a flex container's lines within the flex container when there is extra space in the cross-axis, similar to how 'justify-content' aligns individual items within the main-axis.

CssProperty.name: align-items
CssProperty.description: Flex items can be aligned in the cross axis of the current line of the flex container, similar to 'justify-content' but in the perpendicular direction.

CssProperty.name: align-self
CssProperty.description: Flex items can be aligned in the cross axis of the current line of the flex container, similar to 'justify-content' but in the perpendicular direction.

CssProperty.name: flex-basis
CssProperty.description: The 'flex-basis' property sets the flex basis. Negative lengths are invalid.

CssProperty.name: flex-direction
CssProperty.description: Specifies how flexbox items are placed in the flexbox.

CssProperty.name: flex-flow
CssProperty.description: Specifies how flexbox items are placed in the flexbox.

CssProperty.name: flex-grow
CssProperty.description: The 'flex-grow' property sets the flex grow factor. Negative numbers are invalid.

CssProperty.name: flex-shrink
CssProperty.description: The 'flex-shrink' property sets the flex shrink factor. Negative numbers are invalid.

CssProperty.name: flex
CssProperty.description: Specifies the components of a flexible length: the flex grow factor and flex shrink factor, and the flex basis.

CssProperty.name: flex-wrap
CssProperty.description: controls whether the flexbox is single-line or multi-line, and the direction of the cross axis, which affects the direction new lines are stacked in and the meaning of the 'flex-align', 'flex-item-align', and 'flex-line-pack' properties.

CssProperty.name: justify-content
CssProperty.description: Aligns a flex container's lines within the flex container when there is extra space in the cross-axis, similar to how 'justify-content' aligns individual items within the main-axis.

CssProperty.name: order
CssProperty.description: Controls the order in which flex items appear within their flex container, by assigning them to ordinal groups.
